name: Slime Spin!
description:
Embark on an epic adventure to lasso the incoming cute but harmful attackers: the SLIMES! Although it looks like they want to hug you, don't touch them because they will damage you (even emotionally). Lasso the same colored slimes into each other. Bonus points if you can throw them into each other!

You're playing as a farm girl called Crystal, who is the current owner of the farm after her father's death. Those damn slimes took him and now they're coming to take you as well! Cleanse your farm of these horrid creatures so you can finally live in peace again.

W A S D  or arrows - move

Hold left-click to throw the rope

Right-click to change the lasso direction

Slimetastic! - 11/10  Bob the Slime
